name: Split World (Ducklings Studio)
description:
Intoduction

The protector of the tower went to collect medicinal herbs in the swamplands. But suddenly the most terrible event for this world happened: the crystal that should keep the world in balance was broken and the world has split. Your task is to get to the top of the tower and to reunify the two pieces of the crystal.

 Hints

  •  A - move to the left. 
  • D - move to the right. 
  • SPACE - jump. 
  • Click on the block - move the block to the other world.  (if on other side block doesn't exist)

Walkthrough The goal is to reach the top using manual dexterity and problem solving skills.
